info.title: Astrology API v3
info.description:
# üåü Astrology API v3.2.10 - Professional Astrological Service

**Modern astrological calculations powered by Swiss Ephemeris with comprehensive interpretations and analysis tools.**

## üöÄ **Core Features**
- **High-precision calculations** - Swiss Ephemeris accuracy with 23 house systems
- **Traditional astrology** - Hellenistic techniques, dignities, profections, lots
- **Comprehensive reports** - Natal charts, synastry, transits with detailed interpretations
- **Business insights** - Team dynamics, compatibility analysis, career guidance
- **Pet astrology** - Animal personality and care insights
- **Multiple languages** - Support for EN, RU, FR, DE, ES and more
- **Fast performance** - 50-500ms response times with intelligent caching

## üì± **Perfect for**
Professional astrologers, mobile apps, educational platforms, research projects, and business consulting tools.

## üìö **Documentation**
- **[üöÄ RapiDoc](/rapidoc)** - Interactive documentation with live examples
- **[üì• Postman Collection](/best-astrology-api-postman.json)** - 113 ready-to-use examples
- **[‚ùì FAQ & Help](/docs/faq)** - Troubleshooting and implementation guides

**üåü Quick start: `/api/v3/glossary/active-points`**

get.description: Gets astrological data for the current UTC time.

200.description: Current UTC time data for immediate astrological calculations

x-codeSamples.label: cURL + jq
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X GET "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/data/now" \
     -H "Accept: application/json" \
     | jq .

x-codeSamples.label: JavaScript + fetch
Node.js + axios
Python + requests
x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/data/now"

# Make the GET request
response = requests.get(url)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.label: PHP + cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/data/now";

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Accept: application/json'
]);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

post.description:
üìä **Planetary Positions Calculator** - Get precise celestial body positions

**Perfect for:**
- üéØ Quick planetary position lookups
- üì± Mobile app backends requiring fast data
- üîÑ Real-time astrological applications
- üìä Data analysis and research

**What you get:**
- **Precise positions** for all requested celestial bodies
- **Zodiac signs** (3-letter codes: Ari, Tau, Gem, etc.)
- **Degrees within signs** (0.0 to 29.99)
- **Absolute longitude** (0-360¬∞ full zodiac position)
- **Retrograde status** for all planets
- **Planetary speed** (degrees per day)

**Supported celestial bodies:**
- **Planets**: Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto
- **Lunar Nodes**: Mean_Node, True_Node, Mean_South_Node, True_South_Node
- **Angles**: Ascendant, Medium_Coeli, Descendant, Imum_Coeli
- **Points**: Mean_Lilith, True_Lilith, Pars_Fortunae, Vertex
- **Asteroids**: Chiron, Ceres, Pallas, Juno, Vesta

**Location handling:**
- Provide city + country_code for automatic geocoding
- Or use exact latitude/longitude coordinates
- Timezone automatically detected or specify manually

**Response time:** ~100ms | **Accuracy:** Swiss Ephemeris precision
- ‚úÖ **City geocoding** - just provide city name, we handle coordinates & timezone

Perfect for applications needing precise astronomical data without interpretations.

basic_positions.description: Standard planetary positions with main planets and moderate precision

extended_precision.description: All planets, asteroids, and special points with maximum precision

traditional_points.description: Focus on traditional points including Arabic Parts and nodes

sidereal_calculation.description: Vedic/Sidereal zodiac calculation with traditional points

200.description: Precise planetary positions with coordinates, houses, and motion data

comprehensive_positions.summary: Complete planetary positions with all data
comprehensive_positions.description: Example showing precise positions for main planets with retrograde motion, house placements, and speed calculations

angles_and_nodes.description: Example showing Ascendant, Midheaven, and North/South Node positions

     | jq .

x-codeSamples.label: JavaScript + fetch
Node.js + axios
Python + requests
x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/data/positions"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

}
?>

post.description:
üè† **House Cusps Calculator** - Precise astrological house boundaries

**Perfect for:**
- üéØ House system comparisons and analysis
- üì± Chart calculation backends
- üîÑ Real-time house position tracking
- üìä Astrological research and education

**What you get:**
- **All 12 house cusps** with precise degree positions
- **Zodiac signs** for each house cusp (3-letter codes: Ari, Tau, Gem, etc.)
- **Degrees within signs** (0.0 to 29.99)
- **Absolute longitude** (0-360¬∞ full zodiac position)
- **House system flexibility** - 23+ systems supported

**Supported house systems:**
- **P** (Placidus) - Most popular modern system
- **W** (Whole Sign) - Traditional/Hellenistic system
- **K** (Koch), **E** (Equal), **C** (Campanus)
- Plus 18 additional systems - see `/api/v3/glossary/house-systems`

**Location handling:**
- Provide city + country_code for automatic geocoding
- Or use exact latitude/longitude coordinates
- Timezone automatically detected or specify manually

**Note:** House cusps are location-dependent and require precise birth coordinates.
This endpoint provides the foundation for accurate house-based interpretations.

**Response time:** ~120ms | **Accuracy:** Swiss Ephemeris precision

placidus_system.description: Most popular modern house system with unequal houses

whole_sign_traditional.description: Traditional Hellenistic system with equal 30¬∞ houses

koch_system.description: Popular European house system with time-based calculations

equal_houses.description: Simple system with equal 30¬∞ houses from Ascendant

200.description: Precise astrological house boundaries with zodiac signs and degrees

placidus_system_cusps.description: Complete set of 12 house cusps using Placidus system with precise degrees

whole_sign_cusps.description: Traditional whole sign houses where each house equals one complete zodiac sign

intercepted_houses.description: Example showing houses with intercepted signs (signs contained entirely within a house)

post.description:
üîó **Planetary Aspects Calculator** - Precise angular relationships between celestial bodies

**Perfect for:**
- üéØ Chart interpretation and analysis
- üì± Astrology app aspect displays
- üîÑ Real-time aspect tracking
- üìä Astrological research and education

**What you get:**
- **Major aspects** between all selected celestial bodies
- **Precise orb measurements** (exact angular distance from perfect aspect)
- **Aspect types** (conjunction, opposition, trine, square, sextile, etc.)
- **Applying/separating status** for dynamic interpretation
- **Configurable precision** for orb values (0-6 decimal places)

**Supported aspects:**
- **Conjunction** (0¬∞) - Unity and blending of energies
- **Opposition** (180¬∞) - Tension and awareness
- **Trine** (120¬∞) - Harmony and flow
- **Square** (90¬∞) - Challenge and action
- **Sextile** (60¬∞) - Opportunity and cooperation
- **Plus minor aspects** - quincunx, semi-square, sesquiquadrate

**Celestial bodies included:**
- **All planets** including South Nodes (Mean_South_Node, True_South_Node)
- **Lunar Nodes** and special points
- **Flexible point selection** - choose which bodies to include

**Response time:** ~150ms | **Accuracy:** Swiss Ephemeris precision

major_aspects.description: Traditional major aspects between main planets

extended_aspects.description: Comprehensive aspects including outer planets, asteroids, and nodes

nodal_aspects.description: Aspects involving North and South lunar nodes with karmic implications

post.description:
üåô **Comprehensive Lunar Analysis** - Detailed Moon phase and cycle information

**Perfect for:**
- üåô Lunar timing and planning
- üì± Moon phase apps and calendars
- üéØ Electional astrology (choosing optimal timing)
- üìä Agricultural and natural cycle tracking

**What you get:**
- **Current Moon phase** (New, Waxing Crescent, First Quarter, etc.)
- **Phase percentage** (0-100% illumination)
- **Days since New Moon** (lunar day count)
- **Next phase dates** (upcoming New Moon, Full Moon, etc.)
- **Lunar mansion/nakshatra** (traditional lunar divisions)
- **Void of Course periods** (when Moon makes no major aspects)

**Lunar cycle information:**
- **Synodic month** progress (29.5 day cycle)
- **Sidereal month** progress (27.3 day cycle)
- **Anomalistic month** (perigee to perigee)
- **Tropical month** (return to same zodiac degree)

**Response time:** ~150ms | **Accuracy:** Swiss Ephemeris precision

current_moon_phase.description: Today's lunar phase and cycle information

new_moon_timing.description: Lunar analysis around New Moon for manifestation timing

full_moon_energy.description: Lunar metrics during Full Moon for peak energy timing

void_of_course.description: Lunar analysis for electional astrology and timing decisions

200.description: Comprehensive lunar cycle data including phase, distance, and illumination

waxing_crescent_phase.description: Example showing Moon in Waxing Crescent phase with distance and illumination data

full_moon_perigee.description: Full Moon occurring near perigee, creating a supermoon with enhanced gravitational effects

new_moon_apogee.description: New Moon occurring near apogee, creating minimal tidal and gravitational effects

third_quarter_phase.description: Moon in Third Quarter phase with moderate distance and illumination decreasing

post.description:
üåç **Global Planetary Positions** - Location-independent ephemeris data

**Perfect for:**
- üìä Daily ephemeris table generation
- üóÑÔ∏è Caching planetary positions for multiple locations
- üì± Astrology apps requiring global reference data
- üîÑ Background data synchronization

**What you get:**
- **Precise positions** for all requested celestial bodies
- **Zodiac signs** (3-letter codes: Ari, Tau, Gem, etc.)
- **Degrees within signs** (0.0 to 29.99)
- **Absolute longitude** (0-360¬∞ full zodiac position)
- **Retrograde status** for all planets
- **Planetary speed** (degrees per day)

**Key features:**
- **No location required** - uses universal reference (0¬∞N, 0¬∞W)
- **Both zodiac types** - Tropical and Sidereal calculations
- **Flexible precision** - 0-8 decimal places
- **Extensive body support** - planets, asteroids, nodes, special points

**Excluded points:** Location-dependent angles (Ascendant, MC, Vertex) are not included
since no birth location is provided.

**Use case:** Cache these positions once per day, then calculate house placements
locally for different birth locations to optimize API usage.

**Response time:** ~80ms | **Accuracy:** Swiss Ephemeris precision

daily_ephemeris.description: Current planetary positions for ephemeris table or daily caching

midnight_positions.description: Planetary positions at midnight UTC for global reference

sidereal_ephemeris.description: Vedic/Sidereal zodiac positions for traditional calculations

extended_points.description: Comprehensive list including asteroids and special points

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/data/global-positions"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.label: PHP + cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/data/global-positions";
$data = {
    "subject": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "birth_data": {
            "year": 1990,
            "month": 5,
            "day": 15,
            "hour": 14,
            "minute": 30,
            "city": "London",
            "country_code": "GB"
        }
    },
    "options": {
        "house_system": "P",
        "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
        "active_points": [
            "Sun",
            "Moon",
            "Mercury",
            "Venus",
            "Mars",
            "Jupiter",
            "Saturn"
        ],
        "precision": 2
    }
};

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

- **Composite house cusps** - Relationship-focused house system
- **Composite aspects** - Internal aspects within the composite chart
- **Unified chart data** - Single chart representing the relationship energy

**How it works:**
The composite chart is calculated by finding the mathematical midpoints between corresponding 
planets in both natal charts. This creates a "third chart" that represents the relationship 
itself as a separate entity, showing the combined energies and themes of the partnership.

**Available options:**
- **House systems** - Placidus (P), Whole Sign (W), Koch (K), Equal (A), and more
- **Zodiac types** - Tropical (Western) or Sidereal (Vedic)
- **Active points** - Choose which planets and points to include
- **Precision** - Decimal places for degree calculations (1-6)

**Response time:** ~400ms | **Content:** Complete composite chart with planetary positions and aspects

Node.js + axios
Python + requests
x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/charts/composite"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/charts/solar-return-transits"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "transit_date": {
    "year": 2024,
    "month": 12,
    "day": 25,
    "hour": 12,
    "minute": 0
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars"
    ],
    "orb_set": "medium"
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

post.description:
üîÑ **Natal Transit Analysis** - Current planetary influences on your birth chart

**Perfect for:**
- üéØ Daily astrological guidance and timing
- üìÖ Planning important decisions and events
- üîÆ Understanding current life influences
- üì± Transit tracking and notification apps

**What you get:**
- **Current transits to natal chart** - how today's planets affect your birth positions
- **Aspect direction analysis** - applying (forming), separating (dissolving), or exact
- **Precise timing calculations** - exact moment when aspects become perfect (0¬∞ orb)
- **Transit speed data** - planetary velocity for dynamic interpretation
- **Orb measurements** - exact angular distance from perfect aspects

**Analysis includes:**
- **Major life transits** (Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto)
- **Personal daily transits** (Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars)
- **Nodal transits** for karmic timing and life direction
- **Angular transits** to Ascendant, Midheaven for major life themes

**Technical features:**
- **Aspect direction**: "applying" (forming), "separating" (dissolving), or "exact"
- **Exact timing**: ISO datetime when aspect perfects (for close applying aspects)
- **Transit speed**: Planet speed in degrees/day (negative = retrograde)

**Example response data:**
```json
{
    "date": "2024-01-15",
    "exact_time": "2024-01-15T14:32:00",
    "transiting_planet": "Mars",
    "aspect_type": "trine",
    "stationed_planet": "Sun",
    "orb": 0.75,
    "aspect_direction": "applying",
    "transiting_speed": 0.524
}
```

**Response time:** ~300ms | **Accuracy:** Swiss Ephemeris precision

current_transits.description: Current planetary transits to natal chart for timing and guidance

major_transits_year.description: Outer planet transits for the year with wider orbs for long-term planning

precise_timing.description: High-precision weekly transit analysis for exact timing of events

200.description: Successful natal transit calculation with current planetary influences on birth chart

successful_response.description: Complete transit analysis to natal chart with precise timing and aspects

validation_error.description: Example of validation error for invalid orb parameter

detail.msg: Orb must be between 0.1 and 10.0 degrees

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/svg/composite"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

interpretations.title: Sun in Tau
interpretations.text: With the Sun in Taurus, you possess a natural stability and determination that serves as your core foundation. You approach life with patience and practicality, preferring to build slowly and steadily toward your goals. Your Taurus Sun gives you a deep appreciation for beauty, comfort, and the finer things in life, while your reliable nature makes you someone others can count on through both good times and challenges.

interpretations.title: Moon in Sco
interpretations.text: Your Moon in Scorpio reveals intense emotional depths and a powerful intuitive nature. You feel everything deeply and have a natural ability to understand the hidden motivations and psychological undercurrents in any situation. This placement gives you emotional resilience and the ability to transform through life's challenges, though you may tend to keep your most vulnerable feelings private.

interpretations.title: Mercury in Gem
interpretations.text: Mercury in Gemini blesses you with a quick, versatile mind that thrives on variety and intellectual stimulation. You're naturally curious about everything and have a gift for communication, easily adapting your conversational style to connect with different people. Your mental agility allows you to process information rapidly and see multiple perspectives on any issue.

interpretations.title: Venus in Ari
interpretations.text: Venus in Aries brings passion and spontaneity to your approach to love and relationships. You're drawn to exciting, dynamic partners and prefer direct, honest expressions of affection. In love, you can be both passionate and impatient, often falling quickly but also expecting immediate reciprocation of your feelings.

interpretations.title: Mars in Aqu
interpretations.text: Mars in Aquarius drives you to fight for causes greater than yourself and pursue your goals in unconventional ways. You're motivated by ideals of progress, equality, and innovation, and you prefer to take action as part of a group rather than going it alone. Your approach to conflict is often detached and intellectual rather than purely emotional.

interpretations.title: Sun in House_10
interpretations.text: With your Sun in the 10th house, your life's purpose is closely tied to your career and public reputation. You have natural leadership abilities and a strong drive to achieve recognition and success in your chosen field. Your identity is significantly shaped by your professional accomplishments and the respect you earn from others.

interpretations.title: Moon in House_4
interpretations.text: Your Moon in the 4th house emphasizes the importance of home, family, and emotional security in your life. You have strong ties to your roots and may be particularly influenced by your mother or family heritage. Creating a safe, nurturing home environment is essential for your emotional well-being.

interpretations.title: Sun_opposition_Moon
interpretations.text: The opposition between your Sun and Moon creates internal tension between your conscious goals and emotional needs. You may often feel torn between what you want to achieve and what you need for emotional fulfillment. Learning to integrate these opposing forces will be a key theme in your personal development.

interpretations.title: Sun_trine_Jupiter
interpretations.text: The trine between your Sun and Jupiter brings optimism, good fortune, and expansion opportunities into your life. You naturally attract positive experiences and have faith in your ability to succeed. This aspect supports growth, wisdom, and a generous spirit that others find inspirational.

interpretations.title: Venus_square_Saturn
interpretations.text: The square between Venus and Saturn may create challenges in love and relationships, often manifesting as feelings of unworthiness or difficulty expressing affection. However, this aspect also teaches valuable lessons about commitment, loyalty, and the importance of building relationships on solid foundations rather than fleeting attractions.

interpretations.title: Moon in Leo

interpretations.title: Lunar Day 6 Energy

interpretations.title: 28% Illumination Impact

interpretations.title: Distance and Emotional Intensity

interpretations.title: Optimal Timing Guidance

value.report_title: Synastry Report: Emma Watson & James Smith

sections.title: Romantic Attraction & Chemistry
sections.content: The Venus-Mars conjunction between your charts creates immediate and powerful romantic chemistry. Emma's Venus in Gemini conjunct James's Mars in Gemini indicates strong intellectual and communicative attraction, with both partners finding each other mentally stimulating and verbally engaging. This aspect supports a relationship built on shared interests, lively conversations, and mutual curiosity about each other's thoughts and ideas.

sections.title: Emotional Compatibility
sections.content: Emma's Moon in Scorpio forms a harmonious trine with James's Sun in Pisces, creating deep emotional understanding and intuitive connection. James naturally supports Emma's need for emotional depth and transformation, while Emma provides the intensity and passion that James's gentle Pisces nature craves. This aspect indicates strong emotional compatibility and the ability to understand each other's deeper feelings without words.

sections.title: Communication Patterns
sections.content: Mercury square Mercury between your charts suggests different communication styles that may require conscious effort to bridge. Emma's Mercury in Taurus prefers practical, direct communication, while James's Mercury in Leo enjoys dramatic, expressive dialogue. While this can lead to misunderstandings, it also provides opportunities for growth as you learn to appreciate each other's unique ways of expressing thoughts and ideas.

sections.title: Shared Values & Life Direction
sections.content: The Sun trine Jupiter aspect between your charts indicates shared philosophical outlooks and complementary life goals. James's optimistic Jupiter in Sagittarius expands and supports Emma's Taurus Sun's practical ambitions, while Emma helps ground Jupiter's expansive visions in reality. This aspect suggests strong potential for growth and success as a couple, with both partners supporting each other's dreams and aspirations.

sections.title: Areas for Growth & Awareness
sections.content: Saturn square Venus in your synastry indicates potential challenges around commitment and expressing affection. James's Saturn in Virgo may sometimes feel critical of Emma's Venus in Gemini's need for variety and social connection. This aspect requires patience and understanding, as it ultimately teaches both partners about the importance of commitment, responsibility, and building relationships on solid foundations rather than fleeting attractions.

sections.title: Long-term Potential
sections.content: The overall synastry pattern shows strong potential for a lasting, growth-oriented relationship. The combination of emotional compatibility (Moon-Sun trine), intellectual attraction (Venus-Mars conjunction), and shared vision (Sun-Jupiter trine) creates a solid foundation. The challenging aspects provide opportunities for personal development and deeper understanding. With conscious effort and communication, this relationship can evolve into a deeply satisfying, long-term partnership.

interpretations.title: Solar Return Overview - Year Ahead
interpretations.text: This solar return year emphasizes expansion, learning, and new horizons. With the return Sun in the 9th house, this is a year for broadening your perspective through travel, education, or philosophical exploration. Expect opportunities for growth that take you beyond your comfort zone and expand your understanding of the world.

interpretations.title: Moon in 1st House - Emotional Focus
interpretations.text: The Solar Return Moon in your 1st house indicates a year of emotional renewal and personal transformation. Your feelings and intuition will play a major role in the decisions you make this year. This placement suggests increased emotional sensitivity and a need to honor your authentic feelings as you navigate the year ahead.

interpretations.title: Mercury in 8th House - Deep Investigation
interpretations.text: Mercury in the 8th house of your Solar Return chart suggests a year of researching, investigating, and uncovering hidden truths. Your mental focus turns to subjects that require depth and intensity - psychology, finances, shared resources, or transformational healing. Expect important communications related to joint finances or intimate partnerships.

interpretations.title: Venus in 9th House - Love Through Learning
interpretations.text: Venus joining the Sun in the 9th house brings romance and beauty into your educational and travel experiences. You may meet someone special while traveling or studying, or find that relationships are enhanced through shared philosophical or cultural interests. Artistic inspiration comes from foreign sources or higher learning.

interpretations.title: Mars in 7th House - Relationship Dynamics
interpretations.text: Mars in the 7th house of partnerships indicates an active and potentially challenging year in relationships. You may be more assertive with partners or attract more dynamic individuals into your life. This placement can bring energy and passion to partnerships but requires conscious effort to avoid conflicts or power struggles.

interpretations.title: Key Themes for the Year
interpretations.text: The dominant theme is expansion through learning and relationships. The 9th house emphasis encourages you to think bigger, travel more, and embrace new philosophies. The 7th house Mars suggests that partnerships will be a catalyst for growth, though they may also present challenges that help you develop better negotiation skills and personal boundaries.

interpretations.title: Timing and Seasonal Influences
interpretations.text: The strongest manifestations of these themes will likely occur during Taurus season (late April - May) when transiting planets activate your Solar Return Sun position. Pay special attention to developments around the autumn equinox when the Sun opposes your return position, potentially bringing relationship or educational matters to a head.

with descriptions, formulas, and meanings.

200.description: Traditional Points (Arabic Parts/Lots) Glossary

complete_traditional_points.description: All supported traditional points with formulas and meanings

Part_of_Fortune.name: Part of Fortune
Part_of_Fortune.traditional_meaning: Material fortune, bodily health, wealth accumulation
Part_of_Fortune.house_significance: Shows area of greatest material fortune and bodily well-being

Part_of_Spirit.name: Part of Spirit
Part_of_Spirit.house_significance: Shows area of spiritual development and reputation building

Part_of_Love.name: Part of Love
Part_of_Love.house_significance: Shows area where love and relationships flourish

Part_of_Courage.name: Part of Courage
Part_of_Courage.traditional_meaning: Courage, bravery, military success, conflict resolution
Part_of_Courage.house_significance: Shows area where courage and strength are most needed/expressed

Part_of_Necessity.name: Part of Necessity
Part_of_Necessity.traditional_meaning: Necessity, obligation, what cannot be avoided
Part_of_Necessity.house_significance: Shows area of necessary obligations and fated circumstances

calculation_notes: Day/night formulas differ for Part of Fortune and Part of Spirit - they are complementary
All calculations use absolute longitude (0-360¬∞) then reduce to zodiacal position
House placement calculated from house cusps using selected house system
Traditional sources: Ptolemy (Tetrabiblos), Valens (Anthologies), Abu Ma'shar (Great Introduction)
Some parts use other parts in their formulas (e.g., Part of Courage uses Part of Fortune)
Sect considerations apply - day/night chart status affects interpretation emphasis

essential_parts_only.description: Core traditional points with complementary day/night formulas

calculation_notes: These are complementary points - when one uses Asc+Moon-Sun, the other uses Asc+Sun-Moon
Day charts emphasize Part of Spirit (soul), night charts emphasize Part of Fortune (body)

get.description:
üëë **Essential Dignities System Glossary**

Complete explanation of the traditional dignity system with rulers, 
meanings, and hierarchical importance.

**Dignities Explained:**
- **Domicile**: Planet in own sign (strongest)
- **Exaltation**: Planet in exaltation sign
- **Triplicity**: Elemental rulership (sect-dependent)
- **Term/Bounds**: Egyptian terms system
- **Decan/Face**: 10-degree rulerships

**Debilities:**
- **Exile/Detriment**: Opposite of domicile
- **Fall**: Opposite of exaltation

**Traditional Rulers:**
- Pre-modern planetary rulers only
- Sect-based triplicity rulers
- Historical sources and variations

**Sect System:**
- Day vs night chart determination
- Planetary sect preferences
- Triplicity ruler activation

200.description: Essential Dignities System Complete Reference

complete_dignity_system.description: Full traditional dignity system with rulers, meanings, and sect analysis

domicile.name: Domicile
domicile.description: Planet in its own sign - strongest essential dignity
domicile.analogy: Planet at home, in full control of resources
domicile.effect: Planet expresses its nature most purely and powerfully

exaltation.name: Exaltation
exaltation.description: Planet in its exaltation sign - second strongest dignity
exaltation.analogy: Planet honored as guest, given special status
exaltation.effect: Planet performs at its highest potential, elevated expression

triplicity.name: Triplicity
triplicity.analogy: Planet comfortable in familiar elemental environment
triplicity.effect: Planet operates harmoniously within elemental context

term.name: Term/Bounds
term.analogy: Planet has limited authority in specific degree ranges
term.calculation: Each sign divided into 5 unequal segments ruled by different planets
term.effect: Moderate dignity, planet has some authority but limited scope

decan.name: Decan/Face
decan.analogy: Planet has minimal authority, like a messenger or representative
decan.order: Mars, Sun, Venus, Mercury, Moon, Saturn, Jupiter (repeating)
decan.calculation: Each sign has three 10¬∞ decans following Chaldean planetary order

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/traditional/dignities"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

**Perfect for:**
- üîç Location autocompletion in astrology apps
- üåé Browsing cities by country for chart calculations
- üìç Finding exact city names and country codes
- üéØ Location validation for birth data

**Search Examples:**
- `search=Lon` ‚Üí Returns London, Long Beach, etc.
- `country_code=GB` ‚Üí All UK cities
- `search=Par&country_code=FR` ‚Üí Paris and other French cities starting with "Par"
- `sort_by=name&sort_order=asc` ‚Üí Alphabetical order
- `limit=10&offset=0` ‚Üí First 10 results for pagination

**Use Cases:**
- **Autocomplete**: Use `search` parameter for real-time suggestions
- **Country Browse**: Use `country_code` to show all cities in a country
- **Validation**: Verify city names exist before chart calculations
- **Popular Cities**: Sort by `population` desc to show major cities first

**Response includes:**
- City name, country code, population
- Coordinates (latitude, longitude) for calculations
- Timezone information where available

**Response time:** ~50ms | **Database:** GeoNames (15,000+ cities)

get.description:
üìö **Complete Celestial Bodies Reference** - All supported points with descriptions and types

**Perfect for:**
- üéØ Discovering all available celestial bodies
- üì± Building dynamic UI selectors with categories
- üéì Learning about different astrological points
- üîç Finding exact names for API requests
- üè∑Ô∏è Filtering by celestial body types

**Available types:**
- **planet** - Planets including Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto
- **lunar-node** - Mean_Node, True_Node, Mean_South_Node, True_South_Node
- **angle** - Ascendant, Medium_Coeli, Descendant, Imum_Coeli, Vertex
- **special-point** - Mean_Lilith, True_Lilith, Pars_Fortunae
- **asteroid** - Chiron, Ceres, Pallas, Juno, Vesta
- **fixed-star** - 23 major stars including Royal Stars

**Each entry includes:**
- **id** - Exact name to use in API requests
- **description** - Detailed astrological meaning  
- **type** - Category for filtering and grouping
- **strength** - Relative importance (0.0-2.0, higher = more important)

**Strength scale:**
- **2.0** - Core luminaries (Sun, Moon) and Ascendant
- **1.8** - Personal planets (Mercury, Venus, Mars) and Midheaven
- **1.6** - Social planets (Jupiter, Saturn) and major nodes
- **1.4** - Outer planets and healing points (Chiron)
- **1.0-1.2** - Special points and asteroids
- **0.8** - Most fixed stars (1.2 for Royal Stars)

**Filtering examples:**
- `?type=planet` - Get only planets
- `?type=angle` - Get only angles (ASC, MC, DSC, IC)
- No filter - Get all celestial bodies

**üåü Start here to explore all available celestial bodies for your calculations!**

get.description:
üåü **Primary Active Points** - Essential celestial bodies for core astrological interpretation

Returns only the most important active points with strength ‚â• 1.4, representing the 
fundamental elements every astrologer uses for chart interpretation.

**Perfect for:**
- üéØ Essential chart analysis with core elements only
- üì± Simplified UI for beginners focusing on primary factors
- ‚ö° Fast calculations with most impactful points
- üéì Educational applications teaching fundamental astrology
- üìä Priority-based chart interpretation systems

**Primary celestial bodies included:**
- **All Traditional Planets** (Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn)
- **Modern Planets** (Uranus, Neptune, Pluto) 
- **Major Angles** (Ascendant, Medium_Coeli, Descendant, Imum_Coeli)
- **Lunar Nodes** (Mean_Node, True_Node, Mean_South_Node, True_South_Node)
- **Chiron** (The Wounded Healer)

**Strength threshold:** ‚â• 1.4 (excludes minor asteroids, most fixed stars, Arabic parts)

**Each entry includes:**
- **id** - Standard name for API requests
- **description** - Detailed astrological meaning
- **type** - Category (planet, lunar-node, angle, special-point)  
- **strength** - Importance rating (1.4-2.0 range)

**Filtering examples:**
- `?type=planet` - Get primary planets only (Sun through Pluto)
- `?type=angle` - Get major angles only (ASC, MC, DSC, IC)
- `?type=lunar-node` - Get lunar nodes only
- No filter - Get all 19 primary active points

**Use this when you need:**
- Essential points for beginner-friendly interfaces
- Core elements for fundamental chart interpretation
- High-impact factors for quick analysis
- Priority-based celestial body selection

**üî• Perfect starting point for essential astrological calculations!**

post.description:
üåå **Davison Relationship Chart** - The midpoint chart of your relationship

**What is it?**
The Davison chart calculates the exact midpoint in time and space between
two births, creating a chart for the relationship itself as a separate entity.

**Calculation:**
- Midpoint in space (latitude/longitude average)
- Midpoint in time (between two birth moments)
- Creates a third chart representing the relationship

**Use cases:**
- Understanding the relationship's purpose
- Timing for the relationship
- Relationship's personality

**Response time:** ~400ms

import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/insights/pet/health-sensitivities"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/insights/wellness/wellness-timing"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/insights/wellness/wellness-timing";

    "subject": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "birth_data": {
            "year": 1990,
            "month": 5,

            "hour": 14,
            "minute": 30,
            "city": "London",

        }
    },
    "options": {
        "house_system": "P",
        "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
        "active_points": [
            "Sun",
            "Moon",
            "Mercury",
            "Venus",
            "Mars",
            "Jupiter",
            "Saturn"
        ],
        "precision": 2
    }
};

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/insights/business/team-dynamics"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

}
?>

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/insights/business/succession-planning"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.label: PHP + cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/insights/business/succession-planning";
$data = {
    "subject": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "birth_data": {
            "year": 1990,
            "month": 5,
            "day": 15,
            "hour": 14,
            "minute": 30,
            "city": "London",
            "country_code": "GB"
        }
    },
    "options": {
        "house_system": "P",
        "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
        "active_points": [
            "Sun",
            "Moon",
            "Mercury",
            "Venus",
            "Mars",
            "Jupiter",
            "Saturn"
        ],
        "precision": 2
    }
};

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

Use smaller orbs for tighter analysis

$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/enhanced_charts/personal-analysis";
$data = {
    "subject": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "birth_data": {
            "year": 1990,
            "month": 5,
            "day": 15,
            "hour": 14,
            "minute": 30,
            "city": "London",
            "country_code": "GB"
        }
    },
    "options": {
        "house_system": "P",
        "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
        "active_points": [
            "Sun",
            "Moon",
            "Mercury",
            "Venus",
            "Mars",
            "Jupiter",
            "Saturn"
        ],
        "precision": 2
    }
};

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/enhanced_charts/global-analysis"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

- **Line metadata** - Planet, type, color, meaning, strength
- **Calculation info** - Ephemeris, precision, coordinate system details
- **Birth location** - Original birth coordinates and city info
- **Keywords** - Astrological themes for each line

- **20-100** - Basic mapping (fast)
- **100-300** - Standard precision (recommended)

- Integrate with GIS systems

lines.meaning: The Sun Ascendant line represents where solar energy rises on the eastern horizon. Living near this line enhances leadership qualities, vitality, confidence, and public recognition. This is an excellent line for career advancement and personal visibility.

The Moon Ascendant line enhances emotional sensitivity, intuition, and connection to home and family. This line is favorable for nurturing activities, real estate, hospitality, and any work involving caring for others.

The Venus Midheaven line brings harmony, beauty, and artistic success to the career and public reputation. This line is excellent for creative professions, relationship counseling, luxury goods, and any work involving aesthetics or diplomacy.

The Jupiter Midheaven line represents expansion, opportunity, and wisdom in career matters. This line is highly favorable for teaching, publishing, international business, law, and higher education. Success comes through knowledge and ethical practices.

The Mars Descendant line emphasizes action, competition, and assertiveness in partnerships and relationships. This line can bring dynamic energy but may also increase conflicts. Good for competitive sports, military, and leadership roles.

The Mercury IC line influences the home environment with communication, learning, and mental activity. This line is favorable for home-based businesses, writing, teaching, and any work involving information or communication from your private base.

The Saturn Ascendant line brings discipline, responsibility, and serious focus to personal identity and life direction. This line can create challenges but also builds lasting achievements through hard work and perseverance.

- **Keywords** - Key themes for each line
- **Strength ratings** - Relative power of different lines
- **Life areas** - Which areas of life are emphasized
- **Detailed descriptions** - In-depth explanations
- **Interpretation guide** - How to read and use the data

**Coverage:**
- **7 Traditional Planets** - Sun through Saturn
- **4 Line Types** - AC, MC, DS, IC
- **28 Total combinations** - Complete reference set
- **Strength levels** - Very strong, strong, moderate, weak
- **Orb guidelines** - Distance tolerances for line effects

**Use Cases:**
- Tooltip content for interactive maps
- Educational content for astrology apps
- Reference material for consultations
- Automated interpretation systems

**Response time:** ~50ms | **Content:** Complete reference database

200.description: Complete planetary line meanings and interpretation guide

AC.meaning: Solar energy rises on the eastern horizon, enhancing personal magnetism, leadership qualities, and self-confidence. This line brings vitality, recognition, and the ability to shine in public. Excellent for careers requiring visibility and authority.

MC.meaning: The Sun culminates at the highest point in the sky, bringing maximum recognition, career success, and public honor. This is one of the most powerful lines for professional achievement and social status.

DS.meaning: Solar energy sets in the west, emphasizing partnerships, relationships, and collaborative ventures. This line brings leadership through others and success in joint endeavors.

IC.meaning: The Sun at the lowest point brings focus to home, family roots, and private foundations. This line enhances domestic life, real estate matters, and connection to ancestry.

AC.meaning: Lunar energy rises, enhancing emotional sensitivity, intuition, and psychic receptivity. This line strengthens connection to the public, women, and nurturing activities. Excellent for hospitality, healthcare, and caring professions.

MC.meaning: The Moon at the Midheaven brings public recognition through nurturing, caring, or domestic matters. Career success in fields involving women, children, food, housing, or emotional healing.

DS.meaning: Emotional focus on partnerships and close relationships. This line enhances empathy in one-on-one connections and success in counseling or therapeutic relationships.

IC.meaning: Deep emotional connection to home and roots. This line strengthens family bonds, creates a nurturing domestic environment, and enhances connection to ancestral wisdom.

AC.meaning: Venusian energy rises, enhancing personal charm, attractiveness, and artistic abilities. This line brings beauty, harmony, and success in creative or luxury fields.

MC.meaning: Venus culminates at the career point, bringing success in beauty, arts, luxury goods, or relationship-focused professions. Public recognition for aesthetic talents.

DS.meaning: Focus on beautiful, harmonious partnerships and collaborative artistic ventures. This line attracts loving relationships and creative partnerships.

IC.meaning: Beautiful, harmonious home environment with focus on aesthetics, comfort, and luxury. This line enhances domestic beauty and may indicate profitable real estate.

AC.meaning: Expansive energy rises, bringing optimism, wisdom, and opportunities for growth. This line enhances teaching ability, international connections, and philosophical pursuits.

MC.meaning: Jupiter at the Midheaven brings the most expansive career opportunities, wisdom-based success, and recognition for teaching or philosophical work. Excellent for higher education, law, or international business.

DS.meaning: Expansive partnerships and international relationships. This line brings growth through others, beneficial business partnerships, and cross-cultural connections.

IC.meaning: Expansive home environment with emphasis on learning, culture, and possibly multiple residences. This line can bring prosperity through real estate or family wisdom.

AC.meaning: Dynamic martial energy rises, enhancing courage, assertiveness, and competitive drive. This line brings leadership through action and success in physical or competitive fields.

MC.meaning: Mars at the career point brings success through action, competition, and leadership. Excellent for military, sports, engineering, or any field requiring decisive action.

DS.meaning: Dynamic energy in partnerships, potentially bringing both passion and conflict. This line can create competitive or challenging relationships that stimulate growth.

IC.meaning: Active, energetic home environment with potential for renovation, construction, or conflict. This line can bring real estate opportunities but may also increase domestic activity.

AC.meaning: Disciplined saturnian energy rises, bringing structure, responsibility, and long-term achievement. This line develops maturity and creates lasting success through persistence.

MC.meaning: Saturn at the Midheaven creates the most structured and enduring career success. Achievement comes through discipline, authority, and long-term commitment. Excellent for traditional professions.

DS.meaning: Serious, committed partnerships with emphasis on loyalty and responsibility. This line can create age differences or traditional relationship structures.

IC.meaning: Structured, disciplined home environment with emphasis on tradition and security. This line creates solid foundations but may feel restrictive or demanding.

line_types.AC: Ascendant - Where the planet rises on the eastern horizon. Affects personal identity, appearance, and how you present yourself to the world.
line_types.MC: Midheaven - Where the planet culminates at the highest point. Influences career, reputation, public recognition, and life direction.
line_types.DS: Descendant - Where the planet sets on the western horizon. Governs partnerships, relationships, and how you interact with others.
line_types.IC: Imum Coeli - Where the planet reaches its lowest point. Rules home, family, roots, and private foundation.

strength_levels.very_strong: Lines within 100km have maximum effect. Life themes are prominently activated.
strength_levels.strong: Lines within 100-200km have significant effect. Notable influence on life areas.
strength_levels.moderate: Lines within 200-300km have moderate effect. Subtle but meaningful influence.
strength_levels.weak: Lines beyond 300km have minimal effect. Background influence only.

combination_effects.multiple_lines: When multiple lines are nearby, effects blend and amplify. Look for synergistic themes.
combination_effects.conflicting_energies: Opposing planetary energies (e.g., Saturn-Jupiter) create dynamic tension and growth opportunities.
combination_effects.harmonic_combinations: Compatible planets (e.g., Sun-Jupiter, Venus-Moon) create flowing, beneficial energy.
combination_effects.power_zones: Line intersections within 50km create powerful energy vortexes with combined planetary themes.

practical_application.relocation_timing: Consider current planetary transits when moving to a new astrocartography line.
practical_application.career_planning: MC lines are most powerful for career advancement and professional recognition.
practical_application.relationship_focus: DS lines are optimal for finding partners and improving existing relationships.
practical_application.personal_development: AC lines enhance personal growth and self-expression abilities.
practical_application.home_establishment: IC lines are ideal for creating a strong foundation and establishing roots.

post.description:
üìù **Text-Based Daily Horoscope** - Ready-to-display text format

**Perfect for:**
- üì± Mobile apps - instant text display
- üìß Email newsletters - copy & paste ready
- üí¨ Chatbots - direct text response
- üì∞ News websites - article content
- üì≤ SMS/push notifications - formatted text
- üé® Widgets - simple innerHTML

**What you get:**
- ‚úÖ **One API call** - complete text ready for display
- ‚úÖ **No parsing needed** - just show the text
- ‚úÖ **Multiple formats** - paragraph, bullets, short, long
- ‚úÖ **Emoji support** - optional visual enhancement
- ‚úÖ **Multi-language** - 11 languages supported
- ‚úÖ **Real calculations** - Swiss Ephemeris accuracy

**Format options:**
- **paragraph** (default): Connected prose text (4-6 sentences)
- **bullets**: Bullet-pointed list with sections
- **short**: Brief preview (1-2 sentences) for previews/SMS
- **long**: Detailed text with all elements

**Emoji option:**
- Set `use_emoji: true` for visual icons (‚≠ê, üåô, üíñ, üíº, etc.)
- Perfect for modern apps and social media

**Use case examples:**
```javascript
// Mobile app - instant display
const {text} = await fetch('/horoscope/sign/daily/text').then(r => r.data);
element.innerHTML = text;

// Email newsletter
const horoscope = await getHoroscope({format: 'long', use_emoji: true});
sendEmail({body: horoscope.text});

// SMS notification
const preview = await getHoroscope({format: 'short'});
sendSMS(preview.text);
```

**Response time:** ~300-500ms | **Text length:** 50-500 words depending on format

x-codeSamples.label: JavaScript + fetch
Node.js + axios
Python + requests
x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/horoscope/personal/daily/text"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.label: PHP + cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/horoscope/personal/daily/text";
$data = {
    "subject": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "birth_data": {
            "year": 1990,
            "month": 5,
            "day": 15,
            "hour": 14,
            "minute": 30,
            "city": "London",
            "country_code": "GB"
        }
    },
    "options": {
        "house_system": "P",
        "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
        "active_points": [
            "Sun",
            "Moon",
            "Mercury",
            "Venus",
            "Mars",
            "Jupiter",
            "Saturn"
        ],
        "precision": 2
    }
};

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

- **Life Path Number** - Your life's purpose, lessons, and spiritual journey
- **Destiny Number** - Your life's mission and ultimate potential to fulfill
- **Soul Urge Number** - Your inner desires, motivations, and heart's calling
- **Personality Number** - How others perceive you and your outer expression
- **Birthday Number** - Your natural talents, abilities, and gifts
- **Personal Year** - Current year's themes, opportunities, and cycles
- **Subconscious Self** - Confidence level and crisis management ability (NEW!)
- **Challenge Numbers** - Four life challenges and lessons to overcome (NEW!)

**Available systems:**
- **Pythagorean** - Most common Western numerology (A=1, B=2, etc.)
- **Chaldean** - Ancient Babylonian system with different letter values
- **Both** - Compare results from both systems side by side

**Features:**
- Master numbers (11, 22, 33) are preserved when significant
- Detailed calculation breakdowns show exactly how numbers are derived
- Personal year calculations for any target year (past, present, future)
- Subconscious self analysis with karmic lessons identification
- Four challenge numbers with life period assignments
- Cross-system comparisons to see different perspectives

- All core numerology numbers with values and interpretations
- Subconscious self number with present/missing digits
- Four challenge numbers (first, second, third, main)
- Calculation breakdowns for transparency
- Number compatibility analysis
- Overall number frequency and balance

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/numerology/comprehensive"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.label: PHP + cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/numerology/comprehensive";
$data = {
    "subject": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "birth_data": {
            "year": 1990,
            "month": 5,
            "day": 15,
            "hour": 14,
            "minute": 30,
            "city": "London",
            "country_code": "GB"
        }
    },
    "options": {
        "house_system": "P",
        "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
        "active_points": [
            "Sun",
            "Moon",
            "Mercury",
            "Venus",
            "Mars",
            "Jupiter",
            "Saturn"
        ],
        "precision": 2
    }
};

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/tarot/cards/draw"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/tarot/cards/draw";
$data = {
    "subject": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "birth_data": {
            "year": 1990,
            "month": 5,
            "day": 15,
            "hour": 14,
            "minute": 30,
            "city": "London",
            "country_code": "GB"
        }
    },
    "options": {
        "house_system": "P",
        "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
        "active_points": [
            "Sun",
            "Moon",
            "Mercury",
            "Venus",
            "Mars",
            "Jupiter",
            "Saturn"
        ],
        "precision": 2
    }
};

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

post.description:
üíï **Synastry Report** - Tarot-based relationship compatibility analysis for two people

**Perfect for:**
- üíë Understanding relationship dynamics and compatibility
- üîç Exploring strengths and challenges in partnerships
- üíñ Gaining insights into romantic potential
- ü§ù Analyzing any type of relationship (romantic, business, friendship)

**How it works:**
- Draws 2 cards for each of 5 key relationship areas (10 cards total)
- Analyzes elemental harmony between cards
- Calculates weighted compatibility scores
- Optional birth card compatibility analysis

**Key relationship areas analyzed:**
- **Love** (Weight: 2.0) - Romantic attraction and emotional connection
- **Communication** (Weight: 1.8) - How you express and understand each other
- **Finance** (Weight: 1.2) - Material compatibility and shared resources
- **Spirituality** (Weight: 1.5) - Shared values and life philosophy
- **Home** (Weight: 1.4) - Domestic harmony and shared living

**Scoring system:**
- **80-95%**: Highly positive cards (2 of Cups, The Lovers, etc.)
- **50-70%**: Neutral cards with growth potential
- **20-40%**: Reversed or challenging cards
- **Bonus**: Elemental harmony between paired cards (+10%)

**Birth card compatibility (optional):**
- Calculates birth cards from birth dates
- Analyzes archetypal compatibility
- Provides deeper personality insights

**Response includes:**
- Overall compatibility score (0-100)
- Detailed analysis for each life area
- Relationship strengths and challenges
- Synthesis of overall dynamics
- All drawn cards with interpretations

**Response time:** ~250ms | **Accuracy:** Professional relationship insights

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/tarot/analysis/quintessence"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.label: PHP + cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/tarot/analysis/quintessence";
$data = {
    "subject": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "birth_data": {
            "year": 1990,
            "month": 5,
            "day": 15,
            "hour": 14,
            "minute": 30,
            "city": "London",
            "country_code": "GB"
        }
    },
    "options": {
        "house_system": "P",
        "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
        "active_points": [
            "Sun",
            "Moon",
            "Mercury",
            "Venus",
            "Mars",
            "Jupiter",
            "Saturn"
        ],
        "precision": 2
    }
};

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

- **Friendly Elements**: Fire+Air, Water+Earth support each other (1.5x)

- **Opposing Elements**: Fire+Water, Air+Earth weaken each other (0.5x)

**For 3-card groups:**
- Center card is modified by flanking cards
- Average of left and right influences
- Provides combined strength and quality

**Analysis includes:**
- Individual dignity calculations for each card
- Overall elemental balance across the spread
- Strongest and weakest positions
- Dominant elemental influence
- Practical interpretation guidance

**Elemental correspondences:**
- **Fire** (Wands): Action, passion, creativity, spiritual energy
- **Water** (Cups): Emotions, intuition, relationships, healing
- **Air** (Swords): Thought, communication, conflict, clarity
- **Earth** (Pentacles): Material matters, health, practical concerns

**Response time:** ~150ms | **Method:** Traditional Golden Dawn system

import requests

  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",

      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }

  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",

    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

# API endpoint
url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/eclipses/interpretation"

# Request data
data = {
  "subject": {
    "name": "John Doe",
    "birth_data": {
      "year": 1990,
      "month": 5,
      "day": 15,
      "hour": 14,
      "minute": 30,
      "city": "London",
      "country_code": "GB"
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "house_system": "P",
    "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
    "active_points": [
      "Sun",
      "Moon",
      "Mercury",
      "Venus",
      "Mars",
      "Jupiter",
      "Saturn"
    ],
    "precision": 2
  }
}

# Make the request
response = requests.post(
    url,
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    json=data
)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/eclipses/interpretation";
$data = {
    "subject": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "birth_data": {
            "year": 1990,
            "month": 5,
            "day": 15,
            "hour": 14,
            "minute": 30,
            "city": "London",
            "country_code": "GB"
        }
    },
    "options": {
        "house_system": "P",
        "zodiac_type": "Tropic",
        "active_points": [
            "Sun",
            "Moon",
            "Mercury",
            "Venus",
            "Mars",
            "Jupiter",
            "Saturn"
        ],
        "precision": 2
    }
};

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/lunar/calendar/{year}"

# Make the GET request
response = requests.get(url)

# Handle response
if response.status_code == 200:
    result = response.json()
    print("‚úÖ Success!")
    print(json.dumps(result, indent=2))
else:
    print(f"‚ùå Error: {response.status_code}")
    print(response.text)

x-codeSamples.label: PHP + cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = "https://astro-api.procoders.pro/api/v3/lunar/calendar/{year}";

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Accept: application/json'
]);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
$httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
curl_close($ch);

if ($httpCode === 200) {
    $result = json_decode($response, true);
    echo "‚úÖ Success!\n";
    echo json_encode($result, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT);
} else {
    echo "‚ùå Error: $httpCode\n";
    echo $response;
}
?>

tradition.description: The astrological tradition to use for interpretations. **universal**: A synthesis of modern psychological and classical methods, based on the works of Parker, Arroyo, and Hand. Recommended for most users. **psychological**: Focuses on inner potential and psychological development (based on Liz Greene). **event_oriented**: A more classical approach focused on concrete life events (based on Robert Zoller). **classical**: Interpretations based on Hellenistic and traditional astrology (Ptolemy, Valens), focusing on fortune and external outcomes.
